newsitem.title: ITALY: Italian cabinet meeting called for 1400 GMT.
newsitem.headline: Italian cabinet meeting called for 1400 GMT.

text.p: Italian Prime Minister Romano Prodi on Tuesday called a cabinet meeting for 1400 GMT , a statement from his office said. It did not say what would be discussed at the meeting.
Earlier the government said it might call a parliamentary vote of confidence to ensure passage into law of a cabinet decree covering development projects.
Ratification of the decree, which will release funds for the re-development of industrial sites in Milan and Naples, has been threatened by filibustering tactics from opposition parties.
